item.description:
PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR ATTENDANCE BY WED, 5/16 - I AM HOLDING A RESERVATION ON THE BOAT FOR PEOPLE ACROSS 2 GROUPS AND NEED TO GET BACK TO THE CHARTER OPERATOR.

Venue info:

1 Pier 6, Eighth Street, Charlestown Navy Yard, MA 02129 | 617.828.9005 is the contact information for the charter -

From the Living Social website...

"You know a day of frivolous fun upon the hub's charming cobblestone streets is sure to make a splash with your pals. But, a cruise? That'll create tidal waves. Round up your first, second, and third mates for \ a two-hour, BYOB cruise -- regularly $130. You'll board the Tupelo Honey sailboat -- a Coast Guard-certified replica of a 1904 friendship sloop -- in the Charlestown Navy Yard for a cruise of Boston Harbor, led by Captain Don, a USCG Licensed Master. LivingSocial members can earn 25% off a future BYOB charter for up to 12 passengers, too. You'll share BYOB beverages, breathtaking views of the city
Want more? Find Come Sail Away Now on Facebook."
item.how_to_find_us: let's meet near ticket booth - will send cell # a few days prior
item.name: CONFIRMED: 2 hr. Boston Harbor BYOB Cruise!
